reporter_caption.center: IN RE INQUEST MINUTES TRANSCRIPTS IN STATE v. MAYO, 134 Vt. 613 (1976)

caption.center: IN RE INQUEST MINUTES TRANSCRIPTS IN STATE v. MAYO

docket.center: Docket No. 353-75 Wncr. and State v. Mayo Docket No. 1077-75 Wncr.,

opinion.posture: Appeal from Superior Court, Washington County.
opinion.opinion_text: No abuse of discretion having been shown the order of the Washington Superior Court of April 7, 1976, in the above-captioned case is affirmed. Mandate to issue forthwith. V.R.A.P. 41(a).Page 614
